text: @realDonaldTrump Here's your history, Sir: Racist GOP (is that redundant) Ohio state senator uses racist language in discussing whether "the colored population" get COVID-19 more because they "do not wash their hands as well as other groups." https://t.co/wPlyU0RZNm
